SEARCH
Package src.main.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
src.main.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game. Players have a token, a name, and a wallet. The wallet contains the player's money and properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(boolean isCPU)
      Default constructor for the Player. Players should be constructed fully at the start of the game.

    • Player

      public Player(String token, String type)
      Constructor for the Player with a specified token and type.
      Parameters:
      token - The player's token identifier.
      type - The type of player (HUMAN or CPU).

    • sellProperty

      public Property sellProperty(Property property, Player buyer)
      Sells a property to another player if the seller owns it.
      Parameters:
      property - The property to sell.
      buyer - The player purchasing the property.
      Returns:
      The property if successfully sold, null otherwise.

    • getUnmortgagedProperties

      public List<Property> getUnmortgagedProperties()
      Gets a list of all unmortgaged properties owned by the player.
      Returns:
      A sorted list of unmortgaged properties.

    • mortgageProperty

      public void mortgageProperty(Property property)
      Mortgages a property, adding half of its price to the player's wallet.
      Parameters:
      property - The property to mortgage.

    • unmortgageProperty

      public void unmortgageProperty(Property property)
      Unmortgages a property, deducting half of its price from the player's wallet.
      Parameters:
      property - The property to unmortgage.

    • getTotalWealth

      public int getTotalWealth()
      Calculates the total wealth of the player, including money and properties.
      Returns:

      Returns:
      A string summarizing the player's financial status.

    • calculateRailroadRent

      public int calculateRailroadRent()
      Calculates the rent for railroads (Mountain properties) owned by the player.
      Returns:
      The amount to be paid as railroad rent.
